Picnic tables and smaller classes that other colleges.
The things I do for fun are as follows; study, watch movies, get together with friends.
You normally go out to lunch or bring in your lunch and eat it there.

Tips coming from me would be 1st, go to class. Second tip I would give you would be study at least 2 hours for every 1 hour of class. Do everything you are asked when doing assignments, they will help out a lot.
I enjoy going to Eastern Iowa Community College. It is easy for me because of the smaller class schedules. Everyone is helpful around the school.
pageTitle: Eastern Iowa Community College District Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {112800=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 57858=On the Belmont and West Davenport campuses, there are several vending machines located in light filled, reasonably spacious, and comfortable cafeterias. On the Belmont campus, the only option available in terms of more than snacks from the vending machines, is a Subway. It has been in place for only this fall 2012 semester, having replaced the previous commonplace school cafeteria, upon complaints the food served was not well liked. However, many students have acknowledged they quickly grew tired of Subway every week. Personally, I find it expensive to eat on a regular basis and prefer to bring a more diverse selection from home.}

textAfterTable: Lots of clubs and activities 5 stars Great for these types of students This College is great for everyone young or old this is the place to be.. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus I really cant say what they would be... I'm older student and i really just go to my classes and leave...Sorry Bang for the buck CCC gets 5 Stars because they are around the same for other community college in cost. What to do for fun CCC have lot of activity such sports, trips you can go on with your school, we have playes you watch and films...CCC has just about everything you would want to do and if they don't have what you like he you can out in your community and fine fun things to do. Food and Dining We have an OK cafatera..so all give it 3 stars Dorm Life Don't live there its only a community college. Academic Rigor Awesome 5 star Tips
